com.gotenna.sdk.firmware

Class GTFirmwareUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareUpdater

  • public class GTFirmwareUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles updating the goTenna's firmware and notifies listeners about firmware update progress, as well as firmware update success/failure. Created on 2/19/16

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState
      Indicates the various possible states of the firmware updating process.
      static interface  GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when firmware updating processes change.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GTFirmwareUpdater(com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareFileDownloadInfo firmwareFileDownloadInfo, GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
      Creates a GTFirmwareUpdater to help with the firmware updating process.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState getFirmwareUpdateState()
      Determines the current firmware update state.
      void setFirmwareUpdaterListener(GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
      Set the current firmware update listener callback.
      void startFirmwareUpdate()
      Starts a firmware update from the beginning, given that we are currently in the inactive state, and have all the required data.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GTFirmwareUpdater

        public GTFirmwareUpdater(com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareFileDownloadInfo firmwareFileDownloadInfo,
                 GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
                  throws com.gotenna.sdk.exceptions.GTFirmwareFileDataException
        Creates a GTFirmwareUpdater to help with the firmware updating process.
        Parameters:
        firmwareFileDownloadInfo - Info related to what firmware version was just downloaded.
        firmwareUpdaterListener - A listener to receive callbacks about the firmware update process.
        Throws:
        com.gotenna.sdk.exceptions.GTFirmwareFileDataException - when newFirmwareFileData has invalid data

    • Method Detail

      • setFirmwareUpdaterListener

        public void setFirmwareUpdaterListener(GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
        Set the current firmware update listener callback.
        Parameters:
        firmwareUpdaterListener - The new listener.

      • startFirmwareUpdate

        public void startFirmwareUpdate()
        Starts a firmware update from the beginning, given that we are currently in the inactive state, and have all the required data.

      • getFirmwareUpdateState

        public GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState getFirmwareUpdateState()
        Determines the current firmware update state.
        Returns:
        The current firmware update state.
